title: FS: RPPCs - 1937 Cubs (sold) & Red Roses with MLers (NOW $250)
author: Jobu

posts.post_title: FS: RPPCs - 1937 Cubs (sold) & Red Roses with MLers (NOW $250)
posts.post_content:
All prices are net to me and include shipping.

$250 - 1906 RPPC of the Lancaster Red Roses. There is a print version that is more common, this is one of two RPPCs I have seen. I haven't lined up face ids, but the 1906 team had Cy Barger, Bill Chappelle, Rube Dessau, Patsy Dougherty, Tom Downey, Bull Durham, Ed Lennox, and Chief Meyers.

$25 (SOLD) - 1937 Chicago Cubs spring training at Catalina.
Bumping an old post for a reduction and to remove the sold item.
